data.title: NRA Basics of Pistol Shooting
data.meta_description: The NRA Basics of Pistol Shooting course is a great way for you to learn the basics of pistol shooting from the top firearms training organization in the world!
data.text:
The NRA Basics of Pistol Shooting course is a great way for you to learn the basics of pistol shooting from the top firearms training organization in the world! The course may be used for you to obtain the certification for your concealed carry permit in some states. Be sure to contact your county, city, or state to find out whether this course fulfills the requirement.

This easy-to-understand online training program allows you to go at your own pace and learn from the comfort of your own home. Simply go through the online course material, successfully complete the online exam, and youâ€™ll receive your certificate of completion instantly.

This online course is designed to be used in conjunction with in-person training afterwards or while under the supervision of an NRA Credentialed Trainer. In addition, this online course does not meet the prerequisite for an instructor level course without completing the follow-up instructor led portion. Please visit www.nrainstructors.org for information about additional training.

Click here to register today!
